meanings.definition: A type of shrub with bitter-tasting leaves.
meanings.sent1: The bitterbrushes in the garden have sharp thorns.
meanings.sent2: I saw a rabbit nibbling on the bitterbrushes by the trail.
meanings.sent3: The deer made a face after tasting the bitterbrushes.
meanings.sent4: The bitterbrushes stood out in the landscape like tiny spears.
meanings.sent5: The bitterbrushes added a touch of bitterness to the air.

meanings.definition: The act of brushing against bitterbrushes.
meanings.sent1: My clothes got snagged during the bitterbrushes walk.
meanings.sent2: Be careful of the thorns when you go through the bitterbrushes.
meanings.sent3: She joked about getting a bitterbrushes tattoo for fun.
meanings.sent4: The feeling of bitterbrushes against my skin was like a rough massage.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the wind through the bitterbrushes was soothing.

meanings.definition: The bitterbrushes are blooming in the spring.
meanings.sent1: The bees buzz happily around the blooming bitterbrushes.
meanings.sent2: The hikers stopped to admire the blooming bitterbrushes.
meanings.sent3: The bitterbrushes seemed to dance in the spring breeze.
meanings.sent4: The blooming bitterbrushes painted the hillsides yellow.
meanings.sent5: The fragrance of the blooming bitterbrushes filled the air.
